inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to undergo study protocol (in Pasadena CA)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of carotid sinus hypersensitivity (fainting in response to minimal touching or positioning of the neck)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of significant or symptomatic carotid artery disease, or carotid artery stenting or surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of aortic valve surgery or transcatheter aortic valve replacement
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Absent carotid pulse on initial examination (inability to palpate the carotid pulse)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Open skin lesions at the site of Vivio application/examination
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of a carotid bruit on examination
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
